Package blockchain

Class BlockSkeleton

java.lang.Object
blockchain.BlockSkeleton
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class BlockSkeleton extends Object implements Serializable
The BlockSkeleton class represents a simplified version of a block containing essential information. This class is used during the process of propagating block information within a blockchain network.
See Also:
